Module: html_report_content¶

This module contains functionality to handle creating the content for the QA overview pages. The content itself is defined in modules for each page.

Reference¶

This file contains functionality to create the content for the each subpage of the report

report.html_report_content.write_obs_content(page_name, qa_report_path, page_type='', obs_id='', obs_info=None, osa_report='')[source]¶

Function to write Observation content
